description:
At the Law & Mediation Offices of Kirk Seaman, LLC, we represent our Westminster clients in civil and criminal cases. As Maryland trial lawyers, we believe everyone deserves fair representation in court. This is especially important in criminal cases, because the person’s freedom and reputation are at risk.

Our criminal cases

It can be difficult to find good representation for criminal cases, especially for controversial cases. Our law offices handle most types of criminal cases, such as the following:

• Felonies and misdemeanors
• Property crimes
• Violent crimes
• Drug crimes
• Sex crimes

Our civil cases

Our trial experience equips our team with the necessary skills to tackle personal injury cases. We are not afraid to go up against big corporations. To this end, we handle cases related to traffic accidents, trucking accidents and workers’ compensation.

We also provide family law services. These services include serving as neutral parties in family law mediation cases.

Why choose the Law & Mediation Offices of Kirk Seaman, LLC?

Our lead attorney is an experienced lawyer who has worked in the field for decades. He first opened his Maryland practice in Eldersburg, in 1988. He then moved our law office to Westminster in 1997.

Our practice has thrived for this many years by following some key principles. We put our clients first and return all correspondence as soon as possible. Finally, if there are fast and peaceful resolutions to complex problems, we present this to them as quickly as possible.
